hero.description: Full-Stack Developer specialized in Web, Mobile and Embedded development. Expert in .NET, AI & Data, and IoT embedded systems. I design intelligent and performant solutions for your technical challenges.
hero.passionDesc: , I transform ideas into innovative solutions.
hero.aiDesc: RAG, LLM, LangChain, Machine Learning, Deep Learning. Design and training of AI models for intelligent automation and data analysis.
hero.dotnetDesc: Microservices architecture, secure REST APIs, Azure CI/CD, Entity Framework. Over 2 years of experience developing robust and scalable applications.
hero.embeddedDesc: ESP32, Arduino, Raspberry Pi microcontrollers, IoT, Edge Computing. Development of intelligent embedded solutions for automation and real-time control.
